meanings.definition: Having or revealing natural creative skill or ability.
meanings.sent1: She showed her artistic talent by painting a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent2: The gallery displayed various artistic creations by local artists.
meanings.sent3: His artistic flair shone through when he designed a quirky sculpture.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic mind was a canvas of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The artistic masterpiece left everyone in awe of her talent.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of art or artists.
meanings.sent1: The museum hosted an artistic event showcasing modern art.
meanings.sent2: The studio was filled with an artistic atmosphere, inspiring creativity.
meanings.sent3: The cat's artistic behavior of knocking over paint cans amused the owner.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were an artistic canvas painted with graffiti.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted an artistic scene across the sky.
